#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 10000
#define SIZE 25
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int T;
	int i,n;
	int m;
	string s;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		s="a";
		if(n==0)
		{
			cout<<s<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		for(i=1;i<27;i++)
		{
			i=i%26;
			s+='a'+i;
			m=s.size();
			if(s[m-1]>s[m-2])
				n--;
			if(n==0)
				break;
		}
		reverse(s.begin(),s.end());
		cout<<s<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
